backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining product, category, order, vendor, and profile data models with maps for storage and authorization via mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing theme‑token updates and CTA button work with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of multiple frontend pages and components, especially admin, vendor, customer pages, and CTA button usage.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind OKLCH CSS variables for theme colors plus base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App routing setup using TanStack Router with role‑protected routes for admin, vendor, and user pages.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Global app layout with top nav, bottom nav, content area, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with options to return home or contact support.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout with status display and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a modal prompting new users to enter profile details and saves them via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Guards routes by checking user authentication and role, rendering AccessDeniedScreen when unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar with icons, active‑state styling, and cart badge using cart query data.
frontend/src/components/buttons/PrimaryC: A wrapper around Button applying primary CTA styles.
frontend/src/components/HeroBannerSlider: Auto‑rotating hero image slider with manual navigation buttons and slide indicators.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Renders a grid of products with images, discounts, wishlist/cart actions, and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Provides the top navigation bar with search, cart count, user actions, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user, role, product, and vendor-related data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and theme variables, plus custom utility classes and gradient button styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page describing the platform’s mission and features with styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard displaying product, order, vendor stats and a bar chart overview.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin orders list with status display and controls to update each order's status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin page for listing, creating, editing, and deleting products using dialogs and backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminVendorsPag: Admin interface to add and remove vendors by principal ID with a form dialog and vendor list.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays and manages the user’s shopping cart, handling quantity updates, removal, subtotal calculation, and checkout navigation.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a grid of product categories with loading skeletons and clickable category cards.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryListingPage.t: Shows products for a selected category with sorting controls and filtered product grid rendering.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page that displays cart items, calculates totals, and submits an order before clearing the cart.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form page with validation and simulated submission plus contact info cards.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerProf: Customer profile page allowing users to view their principal and update personal details.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrdersPage.t: Displays a customer's order history with status badges, dates, item counts, and totals.
frontend/src/pages/customer/WishlistPage: Shows wishlist items by filtering products based on stored wishlist IDs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing hero slider, category list, deals, and featured products fetched from APIs.
frontend/src/pages/ProductPage.tsx: Product details page with image carousel, pricing, cart/wishlist actions, and review submission.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorDashboar: Vendor dashboard summarizing product count, orders, revenue, and offering navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorOrdersPa: Vendor view of orders including status, customer, date, items, and total amounts.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorProducts: React page for vendors to list, add, edit, and delete products using form dialogs and query hooks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and removing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the e-commerce app’s features, schema version, and capabilities.
